constituent: sleep, eye, people, mouth, family name
koohiiStory1: In an Orwellian sense, the eye watching the people never sleeps.
koohiiStory2: The little boy from The Sixth Sense couldn´t sleep because before his very eyes he saw a dead crowd of people everywhere.
readingExamples: 眠い (ねむ.い), 眠る (ねむ.る)
words:
冬眠(とうみん): hibernation, winter sleep
眠たい(ねむたい): sleepy
居眠り(いねむり): dozing, nodding off
睡眠(すいみん): sleep
眠い(ねむい): sleepy
眠る(ねむる): sleep
